name: Corrida de Renas
description:
Santa's helpers have fun organizing reindeer races ("Corrida de Renas" in portuguese) in the cold fields around the toy factory. The fun is guaranteed and the reindeers are also working out for the day when they pull a sleigh loaded with presents!

This game was created for a programming article about Sinclair BASIC, in issue 6 of Revista Espectro, a Portuguese-Brazilian magazine about the ZX Spectrum.

You can download the .tap file from the emulator. The source code and text of the article are also available.
